name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection in combat.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of polished steel plates that cover the hands and lower arms. They have a comfortable lining on the inside and adjustable straps to ensure a secure fit.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A powerful sword crafted from pure diamond, capable of cutting through anything.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a gleaming blade made entirely of diamond, with a silver hilt and a carved handle. It is a beautiful and formidable weapon.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.piercing_strike: Has a chance to ignore a percentage of target's armor when attacking.

name: Mithril Sword
description: A legendary sword forged from mithril, known for its exceptional strength and sharpness.
looks: The Mithril Sword has a long, slender blade with a silver sheen. The hilt is made of finely crafted mithril and adorned with intricate engravings. The pommel is embedded with a rare gemstone.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a chance to critically strike and deal extra damage.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a long, slender blade with a silver sheen. The hilt is wrapped in white leather and adorned with intricate engravings.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small dagger made of iron, suitable for close combat.
looks: The iron dagger has a short, double-edged blade with a curved handle for improved grip. It is a simple and practical weapon.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A powerful staff made from a magical crystal. It enhances the wielder's spellcasting abilities.
looks: The Crystal Staff is a long staff made from a clear crystal that glows with a faint blue light. It has intricate engravings of arcane symbols along its length and a large crystal at the top.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_blast: Unleashes a powerful burst of arcane energy towards the target.
special_weapon_skills.mana_surge: Empowers the wielder with a temporary boost to mana regeneration.

special_effects.spellpower: Increases the power of all spells cast while wielding the staff.

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: An armor made from the scales of a powerful dragon
looks: The Dragon Scale Armor is made up of overlapping dragon scales, shimmering with a fiery glow. It covers the entire body and provides excellent protection. The scales are colored in various shades of red and orange, with intricate patterns and ridges.

special_effects.flame_aura: Creates a protective flame aura around the wearer, dealing fire damage to enemies in close proximity.

name: Enchanted Staff
description: A powerful staff infused with magical energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings. It glows with a faint ethereal light, and sparks of magic can be seen emanating from its tip.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_blast: Allows the user to cast Arcane Blast, a powerful spell that damages all enemies in a cone in front of the caster.
special_weapon_skills.mana_leech: Drains a small amount of mana from the target with each attack.

special_effects.mana_regeneration: Increases mana regeneration by 10% while equipped.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic one-handed sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a dull gray color. The hilt is made of leather and has a simple crossguard.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A basic staff made from a sturdy wooden shaft.
looks: The wooden staff is made from a solid piece of wood that has been shaped and polished. It has a straight shaft with a rounded top and a pointed bottom.

special_weapon_skils.staff: Allows the use of staff-based abilities and spells.

name: Ancient Sword
description: A powerful sword with a rich history and mysterious origins.
looks: The Ancient Sword has a long, single-edged blade with a slight curve. The handle is wrapped in worn leather and has an ornate pommel and crossguard. The blade is etched with ancient symbols and runes.
